content:
I've searched for round-trip flights from O'Hare International Airport (ORD) to McCarran International Airport (LAS) for the entire month of July, considering your Platinum status and weekday travel preference. Here's a calendar view of the options:

**July 2023**

| Weekday | Departure Date | Return Date | Cost (Basic Economy) | Cost (Main Cabin) | Upgrade to MCE |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Tue | Jul 4 | Jul 7 | $244.60 | $294.60 | $80 |
| Wed | Jul 5 | Jul 8 | $254.60 | $304.60 | $80 |
| Thu | Jul 6 | Jul 9 | $264.60 | $314.60 | $80 |
| Tue | Jul 11 | Jul 14 | $234.60 | $284.60 | $80 |
| Wed | Jul 12 | Jul 15 | $244.60 | $294.60 | $80 |
| Thu | Jul 13 | Jul 16 | $254.60 | $304.60 | $80 |
| Tue | Jul 18 | Jul 21 | $224.60 | $274.60 | $80 |
| Wed | Jul 19 | Jul 22 | $234.60 | $284.60 | $80 |
| Thu | Jul 20 | Jul 23 | $244.60 | $294.60 | $80 |
| Tue | Jul 25 | Jul 28 | $214.60 | $264.60 | $80 |
| Wed | Jul 26 | Jul 29 | $224.60 | $274.60 | $80 |
| Thu | Jul 27 | Jul 30 | $234.60 | $284.60 | $80 |

As a Platinum member, you can upgrade to Main Cabin Extra for an additional $40 per segment (total $80) on any of these options.

Some notes on the calendar:

* Prices tend to be lower during the first half of the month, with the cheapest option being July 25-28.
* There are some price increases around the middle of the month, likely due to increased demand.
* If you're flexible with your travel dates, consider flying on Tuesdays or Thursdays, which tend to be cheaper than Wednesdays.

Keep in mind that prices may still vary depending on the time of booking, and availability of seats. I recommend booking as soon as possible to secure the best rate.

Which date range works best for you, or would you like me to explore other options?
